option.name: start_title
option.value: ROCK ART VR: Game Pass Shelter

events.name: kolorAnalyticsEvents_analytics
events.onTourStart: sendEvent_analytics('panotour','tour start', 'ROCK ART VR: Game Pass Shelter');

krpano.action: set(dotheactioneventsPlugin, false); if (xml.scene == pano107, set(dotheactioneventsPlugin, true); );
set(dotheactioneventsPlugin1, false); if (xml.scene == pano114, set(dotheactioneventsPlugin1, true); );
set(dotheactioneventsPlugin2, false); if (xml.scene == pano120, set(dotheactioneventsPlugin2, true); );
set(dotheactioneventsPlugin3, false); if (xml.scene == pano114, set(dotheactioneventsPlugin3, true); );
set(dotheactioneventsPlugin4, false); if (xml.scene == pano120, set(dotheactioneventsPlugin4, true); );
